headline.main: NAZI VICTORY SEEN BY VICHY OFFICIAL; Benoist-Mechin Indicates on Return From Paris That War's Course Guides France

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Sept. 27 -- Although the official report of today's Cabinet meeting mentioned only internal questions, there is reason to suppose that the relations between France and Germany were also under consideration if only in an informative sense.
